DOC.brief_summary: The objective study , first , identify select clinical covariates electronic medical record ( EMR ) might associate initiation oral anticoagulant medication ( dabigatran warfarin ) patient non-valvular atrial fibrillation ( NVAF ) risk stroke ; second , quantify association EMR-based clinical characteristic pattern insurance claim ; third , assess potential unmeasured confound dabigatran v warfarin comparative effectiveness safety study base administrative claim database .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Predictors OAC Initiation Using EMR Data
DOC.criteria: First dispense warfarin dabigatran October 2010 December 2014 Diagnosis atrial fibrillation ≥ 12 month enrolment database precede date first dispense Age ≥ 18 CHA2DS2VASc score ≥ 1 Prior use oral anticoagulation Evidence valvular atrial fibrillation Missing ambiguous age sex information Patients nursing home stay baseline
